The '''Great Pyramid''' is a massive structure in the city of [[Meereen]]. It is the largest building in the city and it is said a thousand [[Slavery|slaves]] died during its construction.<ref>"[[Two Swords]]"</ref> At its apex lies a huge bronze [[Harpies|harpy]].<ref>"[[Breaker of Chains]]"</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Great Pyramid had been built as an echo of the Great Pyramid of [[Old Ghis|Ghis]], whose colossal ruins had once been visited by noted explorer [[Lomas Longstrider]]. Like its ancient predecessor, the Pyramid has thirty three levels, a number chosen intentionally, since it is considered sacred to the gods of the [[Ghiscari religion]].
